channel.title: Comments for page "Playtester Helmet"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Playtester Helmet"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
…What's not to get? You get the benefits of All Together Now and Stand By Your Ninja themes, without having to set them- It's the itemized version of the effect.

As for the second, most likely it just gives max Dou stats just so that a tester (read: McM) can skip through the checks to do stuff in PW.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: the description is… well, heck, even i dont understand it. rewrite?
